data.title: Malawi Population (2024)
data.meta_description: Discover the latest population statistics for Malawi and explore demographic trends with our interactive data visualizations.
data.text:
Population of Malawi as of today

The current population of Malawi is 21,545,451 with an annual growth rate of 2.578%. Malawi has a population of 0.262% of the world's population.
